title: Traits and Features
content: eywild casts a veil over your mind. You have advantage on saving throws against being Charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep. Elf Drow Half-Elf Longbow Proficiency Feature Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with Longbows. Elf Shortbow Proficiency Feature Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with Shortbows. Elf Darkvision Feature This creature can see in the dark within 12m.
